text: That's why I said, “Go away! Let me mourn in peace. Don't insist on comforting me as the daughter of my people22:4. “Daughter of my people”: probably a reference to Jerusalem. The “ruining” was not the destruction of Jerusalem at the time of Sennacherib's attack, but the huge amount of money and other valuable gifts Hezekiah gave him to “buy him off.” See 2 Kings 18:15-16.  is ruined.”
